citation: Proclamation under the Neighbourhood Disputes About Plants Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Neighbourhood Disputes About Plants Act 2017

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Neighbourhood Disputes About Plants Act 2017 fix 1 December 2017 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

20 November 2017

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 November 2017
